message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 30 and take 70. It's a good starting point!
Let's be fair, Alice. I propose a 50/50 split. It's the most equitable way to divide the money.
I appreciate the fairness, Bob, but I think I can get a better deal. I'll wait for your next offer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll give you 40, and I'll take 60. It's a bit more in my favor, but I'm still willing to negotiate.
